bibl.title: Cercidas, Caelius, and Unsafe Sex: Τυνδαρέοιο γαμβρός (Cerc. fr. 2.28 Livrea).
bibl.note: The phrase Τυνδαρέοιο γαμβρός is pointedly ambiguous and ironical, and serves not to support but to subvert the apparent recommendation of ἁ δ’ ἐξ ἀγορᾶς Ἀφροδίτα.
bibl.seg: WILLIAMS Frederick, Cercidas, Caelius, and Unsafe Sex: Τυνδαρέοιο γαμβρός (Cerc. fr. 2.28 Livrea).
The phrase Τυνδαρέοιο γαμβρός is pointedly ambiguous and ironical, and serves not to support but to subvert the apparent recommendation of ἁ δ’ ἐξ ἀγορᾶς Ἀφροδίτα.
